arts.ttl: Liverpool Handed Huge Injury Boost Ahead of Champions League Opener vs. Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Atlético visit Anfield on Wednesday without one of their most important players.

arts.ttl: Alvarez’s injury blow sidelines him for Atletico’s clash as 22-man squad heads to Anfield
arts.sum: Alvarez misses the Liverpool tie after a knee injury in Atletico’s first win, with Sorloth set to partner Griezmann. Hancko, Le Normand and Gonzalez travel despite recent doubts.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid: Liverpool receive boost as Champions League opponents reveal five injury absentees
arts.sum: Liverpool have been handed a big boost ahead of their Champions League opener as their opponents on Wednesday night, Atletico Madrid, revealed their travelling squad.

arts.ttl: Liverpool boss Arne Slot set to reunite with Atletico Madrid icon after angry row
